dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, uh, we have some really sad news coming out of Kazakhstan today, don't we? A light aircraft crash.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, uh, we have some really sad news coming out of Kazakhstan today, don't we? A light aircraft crash.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Transport Police Department has shared further details about the crash of a light aircraft near Astana that killed two people.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that's right. It happened near Astana, um, specifically near Zholaman Airfield, on June 22nd. Pretty tragic.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that's right. It happened near Astana, um, specifically near Zholaman Airfield, on June twenty second. Pretty tragic.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As reported earlier, on June 22, a plane crash occurred near Zholaman Airfield.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Tragic is an understatement. I heard two people were killed?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Tragic is an understatement. I heard two people were killed?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Transport Police Department has shared further details about the crash of a light aircraft near Astana that killed two people.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Unfortunately, yes. The Transport Police Department actually clarified it was the pilot and, um, a passenger. Both confirmed deceased.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Unfortunately, yes. The Transport Police Department actually clarified it was the pilot and, um, a passenger. Both confirmed deceased.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Transport Police Department clarified that the victims of the crash were the pilot and a passenger.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, wow. So, like, what's next? Is there an investigation underway?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, wow. So, like, what's next? Is there an investigation underway?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. A commission is being formed, and the Astana station line police have already launched a pre-trial investigation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. A commission is being formed, and the Astana station line police have already launched a pre-trial investigation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A commission will be formed to investigate the incident. (...) A pre-trial investigation has been launched by the Astana station line police under Part 3 of Article 344 of the Criminal Code of the Republic of Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] A pre-trial investigation? So, like, criminal charges could be involved here?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A pre-trial investigation? So, like, criminal charges could be involved here?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, yes. They're looking into it under Part 3 of Article 344 of the Criminal Code of Kazakhstan. That part specifically covers violation of safety rules, especially if it results in the death of two or more people due to negligence.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, yes. They're looking into it under Part three of Article three hundred forty four of the Criminal Code of Kazakhstan. That part specifically covers violation of safety rules, especially if it results in the death of two or more people due to negligence.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A pre-trial investigation has been launched by the Astana station line police under Part 3 of Article 344 of the Criminal Code of the Republic of Kazakhstan. (...) Part 3 of Article 344 of the Criminal Code (Violation of safety rules for the operation or use of railway, air, sea, or river transport): an act resulting in the death of two or more people through negligence is punishable by 4 to 10 years of imprisonment...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Uh-huh. Negligence. So, if found guilty, what kind of penalties are we talking about?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh-huh. Negligence. So, if found guilty, what kind of penalties are we talking about?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: We're looking at, um, four to ten years of imprisonment. And potentially, you know, disqualification from certain positions or activities for up to three years.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: We're looking at, um, four to ten years of imprisonment. And potentially, you know, disqualification from certain positions or activities for up to three years.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...an act resulting in the death of two or more people through negligence is punishable by 4 to 10 years of imprisonment, along with possible disqualification from holding certain positions or engaging in certain activities for up to 3 years, or without such disqualification.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wow. So they're really taking this seriously. Have they, uh, established the cause of the crash yet?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. So they're really taking this seriously. Have they, uh, established the cause of the crash yet?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Not yet, no. The department's press service stated that the causes are still being established. It's an ongoing process.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Not yet, no. The department's press service stated that the causes are still being established. It's an ongoing process.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The causes of the crash are being established, the departmentâ„¢s press service stated.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right. Well, let's hope they get some answers soon for the families involved. Just, um, a really terrible situation all around.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right. Well, let's hope they get some answers soon for the families involved. Just, um, a really terrible situation all around.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. Our thoughts are with everyone affected. We'll keep an eye on the developments, for sure.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. Our thoughts are with everyone affected. We'll keep an eye on the developments, for sure.
